name: 李智堯
objective:
本課程培養學生職場必備的核心英文能力，主題包含英文履歷撰寫、商用英文書信、英文面試與簡報技巧、辦公室英文會話等。本課程同時加強學生基礎英文能力，如單字、文法、寫作等，並透過多元活動有系統性地發展英語溝通能力。
This course is designed to equip students with the necessary English communication skills in the workplace. The content will include English resume writing, business English, English interviews, briefing skills, and office English conversation. This course will also strengthen students’ basic English skills, such as vocabulary, grammar, and writing.
schedule:
Weeks 01-04 Unit 1-4
Weeks 05-08 Unit 6
Weeks 09 Midterm
Weeks 10-13 Unit 7
Weeks 14-17 Unit 8
Week 18 Final
